# WithImageObject.ImageOffset property

Gets or sets a reference a point structure which represents the image offset. The default is Empty. Positive values on the y axis move the image down and positive values on the x axis move the image right.

```csharp
public PointF ImageOffset { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

A PointF object that contains image offset to apply.
